Article Title: BCB official calls former Bangladesh captain Tamim Iqbal 'Indian agent' amid Mustafizur Rahman row; triggers protest from players
Article Text:
Mustafizur Rahman; Tamim Iqbal

Bangladesh seek T20 WC match shift from India after Mustafizur Rahman's IPL exit

A senior Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) official’s comment calling former captain Tamim Iqbal "an Indian agent" has drawn criticism from players in the country. Tamim, one of Bangladesh’s leading openers, had advised the BCB not to be driven by emotion while deciding on the national team’s participation in the T20 World Cup in India.Nazmul, chairman of the BCB finance committee, made the remark in a Facebook post."This time, the people of Bangladesh witnessed, with their own eyes, the emergence of yet another proven Indian agent," he wrote.The post received immediate backlash from former and current cricketers, including Taskin Ahmed, Mominul Haque, and Taijul Islam.The Cricketers’ Welfare Association of Bangladesh (CWAB) also expressed concern."A comment made by BCB director M Nazmul Islam regarding former national captain Tamim Iqbal has come to the attention of the Cricketers' Welfare Association of Bangladesh. We are stunned, shocked, and outraged by it. Such a remark by a board official about the most successful opener in Bangladesh's history, who represented the country for 16 years, is utterly condemnable.""Not only because it concerns a player like Tamim, but such comments about any cricketer of the country are unacceptable and insulting to the entire cricketing community," the players’ body said in a statement.The 36-year-old Tamim played 70 Tests, 243 ODIs, and 78 T20 Internationals for Bangladesh."We strongly protest against this comment. When a responsible board director makes such remarks on a public platform, it also raises serious questions about the code of conduct of board officials," CWAB said."We have already submitted a protest letter to the BCB president, demanding a public apology from the concerned board director and that he be brought under accountability. We hope the BCB president will take appropriate action as soon as possible," the statement added.Bangladesh had written to the International Cricket Council requesting their T20 World Cup games be moved out of India after the BCCI asked IPL franchise Kolkata Knight Riders to release Mustafizur Rahman ahead of the 2026 edition."Cricket is the life of Bangladesh. A recent comment surrounding a former national captain who has made a major contribution to the game has caused many to reflect," said pacer Taskin."I believe that such remarks directed at a former cricketer of the country are not helpful in the interest of Bangladesh cricket. I hope the concerned authorities will consider the matter seriously and adopt a more responsible stance in the future," he added.In 2007, Tamim’s half-century had helped Bangladesh eliminate India from the ODI World Cup in the Caribbean.Former Bangladesh captain Mominul said Nazmul’s remarks were unacceptable."The comment made by BCB director M Nazmul Islam regarding former national captain Tamim Iqbal is completely unacceptable and insulting to the country's cricketing community. Such behaviour towards a cricketer is in direct conflict with the board's responsibility and ethics," Mominul said."A senior cricketer was not given even the minimum respect; instead, he was deliberately humiliated in public. Such remarks show a lack of even basic decorum regarding where and how to speak while holding such a high responsibility."I strongly condemn this comment and firmly demand a public apology from the concerned director and that he be brought under accountability. I call upon the BCB to take swift and strict action," he added.
Article Summary: Bangladesh cricket board (bcb) official m nazmul islam called former captain tamim iqbal "an indian agent" in a facebook post. The post received immediate backlash from former and current cricketers, including taskin ahmed, mominul haque, and taijul islam.

Article Title: 'Agar maar padh bhi jaati': Virat Kohli's powerful message to net bowler goes viral - WATCH
Article Text:
Virat Kohli (PTI Photo)

Shubman Gill press conference: Breaks silence on T20 World Cup snub, and more on his future

NEW DELHI: Virat Kohli ’s presence in an Indian dressing room is often felt in moments that don’t make the highlights reel, and a small episode from India’s training camp in Vadodara has once again underlined that side of his leadership. Ahead of the opening ODI against New Zealand, a video surfaced on social media showing Kohli engaging with a local net bowler during an intense practice session, a clip that has quickly gone viral.The incident took place at the Kotambi Stadium on Saturday, January 10, where India were putting in the final touches before the three-match ODI series gets underway on Sunday. After an extended net session, Kohli paused to offer words of encouragement to the net bowler, later signing a cricket ball for him.The interaction came after a demanding practice routine in which Kohli and the net bowler spent close to an hour and a half facing Indian pacers, spinners and throw-down specialists. Fresh off appearances in the Vijay Hazare Trophy, the sessions were designed to replicate match-like pressure, and Kohli appeared fully invested in every detail.During the exchange, Kohli was heard delivering a pointed yet motivational message: “Agar maar padh bhi jaati hai to koi baat nahi, par conviction se, ki main wo ball daal raha hu jo mujhe daalna hai, main wo ball nahi daal raha jo batsman mujhse dalwa raha hai (Even if you get hit, it’s fine.But you should have the conviction that you are delivering a ball that you want to, not the one the batter wants you to bowl).”Kohli arrives into the ODI series in red-hot form.After scores of 77 and 131 in the Vijay Hazare Trophy, he looked sharp against both pace and spin, even though inconsistent bounce from throw-down specialists challenged him in the nets.Now a single-format international player, Kohli skipped Delhi’s third Vijay Hazare match to join the national squad.His recent numbers underline his momentum. Kohli was named Player of the Series against South Africa after scoring 302 runs in three matches at an average of 151. He scored two centuries in the series.Against New Zealand, his ODI record remains formidable, with 1,657 runs from 33 matches at an average of 55.23.
Article Summary: Video shows virat kohli engaging with a local net bowler during an intense practice session. The incident took place at the kotambi stadium on saturday, january 10. India were putting in the final touches before the three-match odi series gets underway.

Article Title: Micah Parsons injury update: Will Packers LB play tonight vs. Bears?
Article Text:
Image via IMAGN

What happened to Micah Parsons?

Micah Parsons return and impact on the Packers’ defense

Also Read:

Tonight, the Green Bay Packers will play the Chicago Bears in a high-stakes Wild Card game. The big issue leading up to the game has been whether or not Micah Parsons will be able to play. Sadly for Packers supporters, the answer is a clear noThe star linebacker will not play tonight after suffering a season-ending knee injury late in the regular season. The absence is a massive blow for Green Bay, who brought Parsons in specifically to make a difference in January football.Micah Parsons went down in Week 15 against the Denver Broncos with a non-contact knee injury while rushing the passer. An MRI later confirmed a torn ACL, immediately ruling him out for the remainder of the season, including the playoffs.Parsons underwent successful surgery on December 29 and has already begun the rehabilitation process. While the operation went as planned, the recovery timeline makes a return this postseason impossible.ACL injuries typically require a recovery period of eight to twelve months for NFL players, depending on progress and setbacks. Even in the best-case scenario, there was no realistic path for Parsons to return in time for a playoff game just weeks after surgery.As a result, the Packers will face the Bears without the defensive centerpiece who led the team in sacks and pressures during the regular season.The Green Bay Packers defense will miss Parsons a lot. He had 12.5 sacks in only 14 games this season and was always double-teamed, which gave his teammates chances. One of the main reasons Green Bay made the playoffs and had a good record was that he could interrupt plays without support from the blitz.Without him, the Packers will rely on a committee approach to generate pressure, leaning on rotational edge rushers and creative blitz packages. Defensive coordinator adjustments will be critical, especially against a division rival that knows Green Bay well.While tonight is off the table, the focus now shifts to the 2026 season. Parsons has publicly indicated that his goal is to be ready for the start of next year. If his rehab goes smoothly, a return around September is possible, though the team may choose to be cautious and ease him back early in the season.Green Bay will need to be sharp defensively against the Chicago Bears, particularly without their top pass rusher. Containing the Bears’ offense and winning key third-down situations will be tougher without Parsons’ elite edge presence.
Article Summary: The green bay packers will play the chicago bears in a wild card game tonight. The big issue leading up to the game has been whether or not micah parsons will be able to play. The star linebacker will not play tonight after suffering a season-ending knee injury late in the regular season.

Article Title: Vanessa Bryant shares a heartfelt thank you post after fans “braved the rain” for an emotional Mamba & Mambacita Forever book signing
Article Text:
Vanessa Bryant (Image via: Getty Images)

Vanessa Bryant’s emotional post shows how Kobe Bryant's legacy still unites fans

Vanessa Bryant’s Mamba and Mambacita Foundation turns grief into hope as fans celebrate Kobe Bryant's lasting legacy

Vanessa Bryant recently shared a heartfelt post on Instagram, giving fans a glimpse into a deeply emotional and meaningful moment from a recent book signing event. The post showed scenes from the “Mamba & Mambacita Forever” book signing held at the Barnes & Noble store at The Grove in Los Angeles. Despite rainy weather, fans showed up in large numbers, reflecting the lasting impact of Kobe Bryant and his daughter Gianna Bryant on people all around the world.The event wasn’t just a typical book signing event, however, it was also a celebration of the lasting impact of Kobe Bryant and his daughter Gianna “Gigi” Bryant through art, memories, and community, where fans received signed copies, took pictures with Vanessa Bryant, and felt connected to one of basketball’s most beloved legacies.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.In her caption, Vanessa Bryant thanked everyone who “braved the rain” to attend the event, calling it “so lovely” to meet fans and personally sign their books. The post was a reminder of how Kobe and Gianna’s legacy continues to bring people together.Through these quiet moments of book signing and warm family and fan interactions, the images captured love and respect and the connection people still feel with the Bryant family.The Instagram post captured several touching moments from the event. From the clips of the video, a close-up signed page from the book titled Mamba & Mambacita Forever, with Vanessa Bryant’s signature alongside Kobe Bryant’s. The video also captured a special art piece of Kobe Bryant in his Lakers jersey, symbolizing his iconic NBA career and influence over the world. These little details highlighted the emotion poured into honoring Bryant’s legacy by his wife, Vanessa Bryant.Originally founded by Kobe Bryant as the Mamba Sports Foundation, as a non-profit organization in 2016, and renamed as the Mamba and Mambacita Sports Foundation by Vanessa after Gianna Bryant’s passing to honor both of their legacies, the foundation focuses on programming sport-related opportunities for the underserved athletes. And beyond the book and the event, fans at the book signing didn’t just meet Vanessa Bryant, they also celebrated what she has built in memory of her beloved family. Many wore Lakers jerseys, shared with her the stories of how Kobe Bryant inspired them, and expressed admiration for how Vanessa continues to honor their legacies and provide young, talented girls and boys with opportunities in sports, even after 6 years of her husband’s passing.Also Read: Kobe Bryant’s wife Vanessa Bryant says friends kept pushing her forward long after Los Angeles Lakers legacy froze time
Article Summary: Vanessa bryant recently shared a video of a recent book signing event. The event was held at the barnes & noble store at the grove in los angeles. Despite rainy weather, fans showed up in large numbers, reflecting the lasting impact of kobe bryant and his daughter gianna.

San Antonio Spurs travel to Boston to face the Boston Celtics on January 10, 2026, at TD Garden. The game tips off at 8:00 p.m. ET and brings together two teams dealing with injuries that are shaping how they play and who carries the load.San Antonio Spurs come in with a 26-11 record and sits second in the Western Conference. Their success has been built on good pace and consistent production from their core players. Boston’s season has required more adjustment. With key absences, the Boston Celtics have leaned on depth, defensive discipline, and players taking on larger roles than expected.The San Antonio Spurs will be without Devin Vassell again. He is out with a left adductor strain, removing 15 points per game from the lineup. His absence puts more pressure on Victor Wembanyama to control the offense inside. Julian Champagnie is questionable due to mid-back discomfort after limited minutes across 37 appearances.Boston Celtics continue to miss Jayson Tatum, who remains sidelined following right Achilles repair surgery. Josh Minott is questionable with a left ankle sprain, while Chris Boucher is out because of illness. These absences have forced Boston to rely heavily on its remaining scorers and role players.The Spurs vs Celtics game will be broadcast nationally on ESPN. Fans can also stream it through NBA League Pass or the ESPN app. Radio coverage is available on SiriusXM NBA Radio and Fox Sports 97.9. Viewers in India can follow the game on NBA TV or through streaming platforms that carry live NBA games.San Antonio Spurs rank among the league’s best offenses, averaging 119.0 points per game. They also rebound well and play at a fast pace, especially on the road. Boston Celtics’ numbers are harder to pin down due to lineup changes, but their scoring has hovered around the mid-110s.Recent Spurs wins have been driven by De’Aaron Fox and Wembanyama, who continue to set the tone offensively.Wembanyama is averaging 24 points and 11 rebounds and will be central to San Antonio’s game plan. For Boston Celtics, Jaylen Brown leads the team with 28.1 points per game. Derrick White provides perimeter shooting, while Payton Pritchard adds steady scoring off the bench.Also read: NBA Player Props: Best Over and Under Picks to Target on Saturday (January 10, 2026) San Antonio Spurs is favored by 1.5 points, with the total set at 230.5. The Spurs’ offensive rebounding and speed will test Boston’s half-court defense. With both teams missing important players, execution and rotation management are likely to decide the result.

The game tips off at 8:00 p.m. Et and brings together two teams dealing with injuries that are shaping how they play and who carries the load. San antonio spurs rank among the league’s best offenses, averaging 119.0 points per game.

Article Title: “She feels exposed”: Taylor Swift reportedly shaken and uncomfortable by Travis Kelce’s controversial confession ahead of their wedding
Article Text:
Taylor Swift is reportedly terriefied because of Travis Kelce.(Image via Backgrid)

Taylor Swift is reportedly scared of Travis Kelce's controversial past, ahead of their wedding

Taylor Swift’s boyfriend, Travis Kelce, is speculated to be retiring this season

Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have had a pretty hard time this season as the Kansas City Chiefs have recorded a pretty average performance on the field this time.With the season coming to an end now, Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce seem to be focused on their wedding. But there is something that is reportedly bothering the billionaire pop star.A few weeks ago, Travis Kelce had confessed on his popular podcast, New Heights, about the time he was suspended when he was caught with marijuana in college.It seems Taylor Swift is really bothered by this confession. As per Radar Online, a source has revealed that, "Taylor hates that this has become a talking point again. She's spent years crafting a clean, family-friendly image, and she's terrified that something from Travis's past could smear that."A second source added, "She's incredibly proud of how hard he's worked to turn his life around – but this story coming back up makes her feel exposed.”The source continued, “Taylor's brand thrives on control and positivity, and this just isn't part of that narrative."However, neither Taylor Swift nor Travis Kelce has responded to these speculations as they continue to be tight lipped about their wedding.Travis Kelce has confessed that he had to go to a therapist after the marijuana incident in college which had a huge impact on him.The popular tight end said, "I had to sit down with a shrink for an hour a week…”Travis Kelce added, "He got me to look at my life way more strategically. He got me to understand that you go through these emotions, and your reaction can either help you or hurt you or be indifferent."Despite the obstacles that Travis Kelce faced in his life, he has proven his worth on the field and is easily one of the highest paid players in the league today and enjoys a massive popularity among fans.However, this season was a bit difficult for Travis Kelce as he got brutally trolled for his performance on the field, while Taylor Swift also looked upset as she cheered him on from her private suite along with her family and close friends.Travis Kelce is also speculated to opt for retirement at the end of this season but nothing has been confirmed yet as he is all set to take a decision in March after his contract ends with the team, the Kansas City Chiefs, after being with them for the last few years.Also Read: Taylor Swift reportedly focused on "protecting" her relationship with Travis Kelce as she stepped back from spotlight during the season
Article Summary: Taylor swift is reportedly scared of travis kelce's controversial past, ahead of their wedding. Kelce confessed on his popular podcast, new heights, about the time he was suspended when he was caught with marijuana in college. A source has revealed that, "taylor hates that this has become a talking point again"

Article Title: Is Jayson Tatum playing tonight vs the San Antonio Spurs? Latest update on the Boston Celtics star's injury report (January 10, 2026)
Article Text:
Boston Celtics' Jayson Tatum vs Chicago Bulls (Image via Getty)

Boston Celtics will again play without Jayson Tatum on January 10

Jayson Tatum's Current Injury Status vs San Antonio Spurs (January 10, 2026)

How Boston Celtics are Managing Without Jayson Tatum

What to Expect Against San Antonio

Thewhen they face the San Antonio Spurs. Tatum remains sidelined as he continues to recover from surgery on his right Achilles.His absence has shaped much of Boston’s season. With no clear return date, the team has adjusted its approach and leaned on depth rather than waiting for its star to come back.Jayson Tatum tore his right Achilles during last season’s playoffs and had surgery in May 2025. Recovery from this injury usually takes nine to twelve months. That timeline places a possible return around late March 2026 at the earliest, though nothing has been confirmed.As of January 9, Tatum is officially listed as out for the Spurs game. Boston has made it clear that his rehab will not be rushed, even if it means missing most of the regular season.The Boston Celtics have stayed near the top of the Eastern Conference despite missing their leading scorer. Instead of relying on one player, the Celtics have spread the workload across the roster and focused on team defense and ball movement.Boston is not fully healthy. Josh Minott is questionable with a left ankle injury, and Chris Boucher is out due to illness. Even so, the Celtics have continued to compete by rotating players and keeping their game plan simple.The San Antonio Spurs face a Boston Celtics team that lacks Jayson Tatum’s scoring and wing defense but remains organized. Boston is likely to rely on outside shooting and disciplined defense to stay in control.San Antonio’s biggest edge comes inside. Victor Wembanyama gives the Spurs a clear size advantage, especially with Tatum unavailable. How Boston handles him in the paint could decide the game.Also read: NBA Player Props: Best Over and Under Picks to Target on Saturday (January 10, 2026) This matchup is less about star names and more about execution. With Tatum out, the result may come down to which team gets more from its supporting players.
Article Summary: Jayson tatum tore his right achilles during last season’s playoffs and had surgery in may 2025. Recovery from this injury usually takes nine to twelve months. Boston has made it clear that his rehab will not be rushed, even if it means missing most of the regular season.

Article Title: Stefon Diggs and Cardi B’s nonstop drama emerges as a growing Patriots distraction ahead of the NFL playoffs despite Drake Maye’s elite MVP form
Article Text:
Stefon Diggs, Cardi B (Getty Images)

New England Patriots face growing Stefon Diggs distraction before playoffs

Update:

The New England Patriots are winning games again, but the noise around them refuses to fade quietly. Foxborough has always known how to handle pressure. What feels new is how often football headlines now compete with celebrity drama. Inside the building, optimism runs high around a second-year quarterback who already looks like the future of the franchise. Outside it, the conversation keeps drifting toward social media clips, relationship rumors, and tabloid-style chaos that threatens to pull attention away from the field.That contrast defines this Patriots season. On one end is the wholesome image of Drake Maye’s inner circle, led by Ann Michael Maye, whose viral moments feel harmless and community driven. On the other is a constant swirl around Stefon Diggs and his superstar partner Cardi B, a storyline that never seems to cool down for long. The disconnect tests the calm culture Mike Vrabel is trying to protect.The uncomfortable truth is that the New England Patriots need Stefon Diggs, even when the attention becomes exhausting. Strip away the drama and the numbers tell a blunt story. Diggs was the engine of the passing attack, finishing with 1,013 receiving yards. No other wide receiver came close. Kayshon Boutte trailed by 462 yards, while tight end Hunter Henry ranked second overall with 768.Without Diggs’ explosiveness, Drake Maye’s ceiling drops fast.That is why patience exists where it normally would not. If Stefon Diggs carried a lower profile, the tolerance would likely be gone already. But playoff football is ruthless, and Maye needs a receiver who can flip momentum in a single snap if the Patriots want a legitimate Super Bowl push.The latest Stefon Diggs and Cardi B episode arrived at the worst possible moment, just as the postseason began. The rap icon clapped back at Diggs’ most recent accuser, extending a pattern that has followed the team all year, even after the couple welcomed their newborn son in November. It makes for viral content, not ideal preparation for chasing a Lombardi Trophy.That context made the Patriots’ timing feel deliberate when they released a mic’d up sideline exchange."I can throw some blocks if you need," Diggs quips."You need to shut the f**k up," Vrabel retorts.The exchange came across as playful, almost reassuring. The message was clear. Stefon Diggs is engaged. Vrabel is in control. Rookie lineman Will Campbell later praised Vrabel’s ability to connect with different personalities, reinforcing the idea of unity.Still, even the strongest coaches grow weary of constant off-field noise. As the Chargers loom in the Wild Card round, the Patriots know one thing for certain. Talent wins games, but distractions have ended more than a few championship dreams. Whether this one proves manageable will define how far New England Patriots really goes.Stefon Diggs has received an updated court date ahead of the playoffs. According to court documents, his arraignment has been postponed to February 13. The original date for his strangulation and assault charges was scheduled for January 23.Also Read: John Harbaugh's future: 3 possible landing spots for former Ravens' coach
Article Summary: Stefon diggs has received an updated court date ahead of the playoffs. According to court documents, his arraignment has been postponed to february 13. The patriots know one thing for certain. Talent wins games, but distractions have ended more than a few championship dreams.

Article Title: Corey Perry leaves Los Angeles Kings after being placed on non-roster status
Article Text:
Corey Perry (Credit: Getty Images)

Corey Perry placed on non-roster status by Los Angeles Kings

On Wednesday, the Los Angeles Kings said that forward Corey Perry had been given non-roster playing status, which means he can leave the team to deal with a family issue, and the company said that Perry is going home because someone in his family is sick, but they didn't say when he would be back or give any other details.The news comes at a very important time in the NHL season, when the Kings are trying to get into the playoffs in the Western Conference, and Perry's absence is a big change for the team because he has been a key part of the Kings' lineup as a veteran player and a competitive edge, and this news quickly made its way into the latest NHL news roundup, which got a lot of attention from fans all over the league.Corey Perry signed a one-year, $3.5 million contract with the Los Angeles Kings ahead of the 2025–26 campaign after his stint with the Edmonton Oilers. The 40-year-old forward missed the opening weeks of the season due to a preseason knee injury but returned to make a strong impact. In 35 games, Perry registered nine goals and 12 assists for 21 points, placing him among the team’s top contributors alongside Anze Kopitar.Following Corey Perry’s departure, the Los Angeles Kings recalled forwards Andre Lee and Taylor Ward from their American Hockey League affiliate, the Ontario Reign, on an emergency basis.The call-ups are intended to provide immediate depth as the team prepares for upcoming NHL matchups during a tight schedule.Los Angeles currently sits in a Wild Card position in the Pacific Division, making every NHL match today crucial. While Perry’s time away is unrelated to on-ice performance or injury, his leadership will be missed in the dressing room. The Kings organization and fans alike have expressed support, with hopes that Perry will return once his personal situation allows.The organization emphasized privacy and support, asking fans to respect Perry and his family during this time. The organization emphasized privacy and support, asking fans to respect Perry and his family during this time, hoping he returns soon to strengthen the team. The team emphasized privacy and support, requesting fans respect the situation during this period.Also Read: Brad Marchand’s lifestyle: Inside Florida Panthers star’s early life, NHL career, and personal adventures
Article Summary: Corey perry placed on non-roster status by los angeles kings. The 40-year-old forward missed the opening weeks of the season due to a preseason knee injury but returned to make a strong impact. The kings organization and fans alike have expressed support, with hopes that perry will return soon.

Article Title: “It's shameful” - Golden State Warriors coach Steve Kerr breaks silence on tragic ICE shooting in Minneapolis
Article Text:
Image via Getty

Steve Kerr issues statement on ICE shooting in Minneapolis ahead of Golden State Warriors’ game

Minnesota Timberwolves coach Chris Finch issues statement after condolence gesture on Thursday night

Also Read:

The Golden State Warriors coach, Steve Kerr, broke his silence on the ICE shooting in Minneapolis. Rene Good, a 37-year-old woman, was fatally shot in her car by a US Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer. The incident occurred on Wednesday morning in Minneapolis, approximately 3 miles from the Target Center. Kerr gave his statement before the team’s game against the Sacramento Kings.Kerr was not the first one to break his silence on the issue. The Minnesota Timberwolves, on Thursday night, held a moment of silence for the victim. The act was widely appreciated across the league. Even Kerr talked about it during his statement. The Warriors coach tagged the entire incident as a “shameful” one.Steve Kerr is known for his unapologetic comments and statements. Ahead of the Golden State Warriors’ game against the Sacramento Kings, the coach was asked for his opinion on the entire ICE shooting incident in Minneapolis. The Warriors' coach, without any hesitation, slammed the authorities while giving out the statement. He started off by appreciating the gesture by the Minnesota Timberwolves.Kerr stated, “Well, I am glad that the Timberwolves recognized her life and the tragic nature of her death. ”He continued to give his opinion on the incident next, “It's shameful, really, in our country that we can have law enforcement officers who commit murder and seemingly get away with it. Its shameful that the government can come out and lie about what happened when there is video and witnesses who have all come out and disputed what the government is saying.” Kerr further continued, “Very demoralizing, devastating to lose anyone’s life, especially in that manner. ” The Warriors’ coach extended his sympathies towards the victim’s family, “It was terribly sad for her family, for her and the city. I am glad that the Timberwolves came out and expressed their sadness.”The Minnesota Timberwolves coach, Chris Finch, also issued a statement after the condolence gesture on Thursday night. He stated, “As we all know, our community has suffered yet another unspeakable tragedy," referring to the tragic shooting incident. Chris further continued to express his condolences to the victim’s family. In the same statement, he added, “We want to just convey our condolences and heartfelt wishes and prayers and thoughts to the families and loved ones and all of those that are greatly affected by what happened. "The incident is indeed a tragic one. Teams within the NBA are expressing their condolences for the victim and her family. This shows the kind of responsibility that athletes within the league carry towards their communities.
Article Summary: Rene good, a 37-year-old woman, was fatally shot in her car by a us immigration and customs enforcement officer. The incident occurred on wednesday morning in minneapolis, approximately 3 miles from the target center. The minnesota timberwolves, on thursday night, held a moment of silence for the victim.

Article Title: Giannis Antetokounmpo and Thanasis Antetokounmpo's combined net worth: Earnings, assets, investments, and more
Article Text:
Giannis Antetokounmpo and Thanasis Antetokounmpo (Image via Getty Images)

Giannis Antetokounmpo’s net worth, earnings, assets, investments, and more

Thanasis Antetokounmpo’s net worth, earnings, assets, investments, and more

Both Thanasis and Giannis Antetokounmpo are professional basketball players, most notably with the NBA's Milwaukee Bucks. As three brothers, including younger brother Alex, were on the same team, they created NBA history. The NBA's Greek sensation, Antetokounmpo, dominated the courts with his talent.His wealth is a testament to his accomplishments on and off the basketball court. The older brother, Thanasis, on the other hand, is a seasoned forward renowned for his vigour and leadership. Giannis is a two-time NBA MVP, and he played in Greek leagues before joining the Bucks. Their combined net worth is roughly $98.8 million.As of now, Giannis Antetokounmpo, a forward and centre for the Milwaukee Bucks and one of the NBA's top players, has a net worth of $93.8 million, according to Forbes. He is now among the highest-paid athletes in the league because of his contracts. His fortune is a reflection of both his astute off-court investments and his extraordinary basketball talent.For the 2024 and 2025 seasons, he was paid $48.79 million annually by the well-liked squad. This is because he agreed to a five-year, $228 million deal extension with the Bucks in 2020.Antetokounmpo agreed to a five-year, $228 million contract with the Milwaukee Bucks following the 2020–21 campaign.He became one of the highest-paid players in the league today as a result, earning an average salary of $45,640,384.According to Spotrac, Giannis Antetokounmpo already agreed to a three-year, $175.88 million veteran contract extension with the Milwaukee Bucks during the 2024 off-season. In 2025, this extension went into effect.His NBA earnings have brought in approximately $283 million, according to Spotrac. Endorsement deals are among the many advantages that come with being one of the league's most popular players.Numerous well-known companies, including Nike, Whatsapp, Tissot, JBL, Kronos Foods, T-Mobile, and Google, have agreements with Antetokounmpo. According to Forbes, he has a shoe brand with Nike called the Air Zoom Freak. According to Business Insider, he has made investments in five businesses thus far: Ready Nutrition, Alt, Wave Sports + Entertainment, Antidote Health, and Nashville Soccer Club.As of now, Thanasis Antetokounmpo is valued at $5 million. Veteran NBA forward Antetokounmpo is presently a free agent recuperating from an Achilles tendon tear. Antetokounmpo, the older brother of two-time MVP Giannis Antetokounmpo, spent five seasons with the Milwaukee Bucks. He has won an NBA championship.Reputable sources like Citimuzik claim this. After being promoted to Filathlitikos' Greek Third level, Antetokounmpo began playing professionally. Antetokounmpo averaged 12.2 points, 4.9 rebounds, and 1.0 assists per game, according to reports.According to sources, the team gave Antetokounmpo a two-year contract deal for $3.6 million after he won his first NBA championship. Antetokounmpo averaged a career-high 3.6 points, 2.1 rebounds, and 0.5 assists per game after signing a new contract. But in the second year of the contract, his performance declined.According to sources, Antetokounmpo secured a $2.3 million one-year contract extension with the Bucks during the 2023 summer. After becoming a free agent in May 2024, Antetokounmpo continued to be a seldom used bench player before tearing his Achilles during a workout.Also read: NBA injury report: Is Giannis Antetokounmpo playing tonight? Star set for crucial return as Milwaukee Bucks eye turnaround vs Chicago Bulls
Article Summary: Giannis antetokounmpo is a two-time nba mvp and one of the nba's top players. His wealth is a testament to his accomplishments on and off the basketball court. The older brother, thanasis, is a seasoned forward renowned for his vigour and leadership. Their combined net worth is roughly $98.8 million.

Article Title: Why did KSI refuse to fight Jake Paul? British YouTuber explains turning down $30 million boxing offer publicly
Article Text:
Why did KSI refuse to fight Jake Paul? British youtuber explains turning down 30 million boxing offer publicly (Image via Getty)

KSI and Jake Paul talks broke down as weight and timing became big issues

KSI has finally explained why one of the biggest fights in modern boxing never happened. For years, fans waited to see KSI fight Jake Paul. The money was huge. The hype was real. But the fight never came. Now, KSI has shared the truth. He said he was offered $20 million and even $30 million to fight Jake Paul. Still, he said no. KSI spoke about this during an interview on BeerBiceps YouTube with Ranveer Allahbadia. He made one thing very clear right away. Money was never the reason he stepped into the boxing ring.KSI said he has already done everything he wanted to do in boxing. He shared that when he fought Tommy Fury, he did not keep the money for himself. Instead, he gave all his earnings to his trainers. That fight helped him learn and grow, not earn. He also said he stayed in boxing for one main reason. He wanted to build Misfits Boxing and finally fight Jake Paul. But after years of waiting and many excuses, he decided to walk away. At this point, KSI says he is done with boxing for good. No amount of money can change that.KSI explained that he tried many times to make the fight happen.He said, “I built Misfits, tried to fight Jake Paul time and time again. It was excuse after excuse.”He also said he was ready when Jake Paul fought Tommy Fury and later Nate Diaz. But the fight with him still did not happen. KSI shared that weight became a major problem. He said Jake kept changing weight demands, which made things harder each time.Later, Jake Paul’s brother Logan Paul spoke about the fight on the Impaulsive podcast. Logan said he tried to help make the fight.Logan Paul said, “I am working on it. I am trying very hard. But there is a weight problem. Jake fights heavier, and KSI fights lighter.”Logan also said Jake now feels he has moved past influencer boxing. According to him, Jake does not want to drop weight just to make one fight happen. Because of these issues, the fight slowly faded away.Even with millions of dollars on the table, KSI chose peace over pressure. As of now, the long-talked-about fight between KSI and Jake Paul is not expected to happen.Also Read: Jake Paul And Jutta Leerdam Combined Net Worth In 2025: Inside Their Boxing Earnings, Olympic Career, Love Story, And Business Deals
Article Summary: Ksi has finally explained why one of the biggest fights in modern boxing never happened. The british youtuber said he was offered $20 million and even $30 million to fight jake paul. Ksi said he has already done everything he wanted to do in boxing. As of now, the long-talked-about fight is not expected to happen.

Article Title: Is Victor Wembanyama playing tonight vs the Boston Celtics? Latest update on the San Antonio Spurs injury report (January 10, 2026)
Article Text:
San Antonio Spurs forward Victor Wembanyama (1) reacts in the first half of an NBA basketball game against the Memphis Grizzlies (Image via AP Photo/Brandon Dill)

Victor Wembanyama's injury report vs Boston Celtics (January 10, 2026)

How Wemby's knee injury unfolded

What his return means for Spurs vs Celtics

Victor Wembanyama is expected to play tonight when the San Antonio Spurs face the Boston Celtics on January 10, 2026. The Spurs’ latest injury report lists the star center as available, clearing him after a brief absence caused by a left knee hyperextension earlier this month.This game matters for San Antonio. The team has struggled to find rhythm, and Wembanyama’s presence changes how they defend and score. With Boston bringing size and skill into Frost Bank Center, the Spurs will need their best player on the floor from the opening tip.The NBA injury report released on January 10 shows no restrictions for Victor Wembanyama against the Celtics. Earlier in the week, he was still listed as questionable, but that tag has now been removed.Coach Mitch Johnson said Wembanyama moved well during rehab and showed no issues after returning to game action. With no minutes limit in place, the Spurs are expected to rely on him heavily as they try to snap a losing stretch.Victor Wembanyama injured his left knee on New Year’s Eve during a rebound against the New York Knicks. He hyperextended the knee and left the game early. An MRI later confirmed there was no ligament damage, and the team labeled him day-to-day.San Antonio Spurs chose to sit him out against the Indiana Pacers and Portland Trail Blazers. The decision was precautionary, with the Spurs focused on avoiding long-term problems during a busy part of the schedule.He returned on January 6 against the Memphis Grizzlies under a minutes restriction. Coming off the bench, Wembanyama scored 30 points in limited time and looked comfortable moving, jumping, and landing. There were no setbacks after that performance.Without Victor Wembanyama, the Spurs struggle to protect the rim. Opponents shoot about 10 percent better near the basket when he is out. His length and timing make a clear difference.Boston is expected to test him early. Jayson Tatum and Kristaps Porzingis will look to attack the paint and force him into tough defensive decisions. Still, Wembanyama’s size and mobility give San Antonio a chance to hold its ground.Also read: NBA Player Props: Best Over and Under Picks to Target on Saturday (January 10, 2026) Fans at Frost Bank Center are expecting a strong showing, especially after his 30-point return. With tip-off set for 7:30 PM CT, all signs point to Wembanyama playing a central role as the Spurs take on the Boston Celtics.
Article Summary: Victor wembanyama injured his left knee on new year’s eve during a rebound against the new york knicks. An mri later confirmed there was no ligament damage, and the team labeled him day-to-day. He returned on january 6 against the memphis grizzlies under a minutes restriction.

Article Title: Jude Bellingham net worth: How much the Real Madrid star is worth, salary, contract, and endorsements
Article Text:
Jude Bellingham (Image Via Getty)

Jude Bellingham’s net worth and earnings

Jude Bellingham’s early football journey

Jude Bellingham’s role at Real Madrid today

Jude Bellingham’s upcoming matches and what’s next

Jude Bellingham is one of the biggest football stars in the world today. The 22-year-old plays for Real Madrid and the England national team. Fans adore his scoring of enormous goals, ball passing, and unrelenting labor. Having already claimed many big awards with Real Madrid, he keeps growing better with every season.Early 2026 sees Jude Bellingham with a net worth of roughly $50 million. Most of his income comes from his football career at Real Madrid. He also makes money through brand agreements, including Adidas.Jude joined Real Madrid in 2023 and signed a very big contract. His pay from the club is very high. Reports say he earns over €20 million a year for the 2025–26 season.That puts him among the highest-paid players on the team. He is also one of the richest young footballers in the world today.Jude Bellingham grew up in Stourbridge, England. He loved football from a young age. He joined Birmingham City’s academy and worked his way up quickly.At just 16 years old, he made his first-team debut. That made him the youngest player in the club’s history. Big clubs soon noticed him. In 2020, he moved to Borussia Dortmund in Germany.There, Jude grew into a top player. He scored goals, helped his team win matches, and became known across Europe. His strong play in Germany helped set up his big move to Spain.Real Madrid signed Jude in 2023 for a huge transfer fee. Since then, he has become a key part of the team. In the 2025–26 season, he continues to play an important role in midfield.He helps build attacks. He scores goals. He also works hard when the team is defending.Recently, Real Madrid beat Real Betis 5–1, and Jude played a strong all-around game.He has also spoken in support of teammate Vinícius Júnior, showing he is a leader inside the squad.As of early January 2026, Real Madrid are fighting on many fronts. They are playing in La Liga and the Spanish Super Cup.Jude Bellingham is part of the squad traveling to Saudi Arabia, where Real Madrid are set to face Atlético Madrid in the Super Cup semi-final.Fans are excited to see him continue his form. He remains a big part of Real Madrid’s plans and England’s future as well. Many believe Jude Bellingham is only getting started.Also Read: Dana White Drops Bold Verdict On UFC’s Greatest Rivalry And It’s Not Khabib Nurmagomedov Vs Conor McGregor
Article Summary: Jude bellingham is one of the biggest football stars in the world today. The 22-year-old plays for real madrid and the england national team. His pay from the club is very high. Reports say he earns over €20 million a year for the 2025–26 season.

Article Title: Linus Ullmark's net worth: Details on Ottawa Senators goalie contracts, earnings, bonuses, and endorsements
Article Text:
Linus Ullmark (Credit: Getty Images)

Projecting Big Bruins Contracts This Offseason | Bruins Beat

Linus Ullmark of the Ottawa Senators’ salary, contracts, and bonus breakdown



Linus Ullmark, who is the current Ottawa Senators goaltender, has turned out to be one of the most financially prosperous goalies in the NHL. Although his net worth is not publicly verified, it is estimated to be tens of millions, in great part due to his high-value deals and performance bonuses. In his last transaction, which was signed at the end of 2024, is a 4-year, $33 million agreement with an average of 8.25 million per season, beginning with the 2025-26 NHL season. This deal is what makes him one of the highest-paid goalies in the league and makes his future financially secure.Ullmark had had several fruitful years with the Boston Bruins before joining Ottawa, where he had a record $5 million cap on his past contract. His accomplishments in this period, which included highlighting performances in NHL games and playoffs, made him a sought-after goalie and prepared him for a highly profitable deal with Ottawa. The regular play made by Ullmark has also earned him performance bonuses, as reported by the NHL updates and news roundups, as well as earning him more through such offers.Contracts are not all about the career income that Ullmark earns.The 2023 Vezina Trophy win. This made him the best goaltender in the NHL. This had some financial rewards attached to it, which was a major enhancement to his wealth. The additional income in the form of endorsements and collaborations with sports brands has supplemented his salary, making him a well-known figure on and off the ice. The news related to the NHL often involves the mention of how go-getters such as Ullmark can make the most of their performance, coupled with their marketability.The influence that Ullmark has on the outcome of the Ottawa Senators has been frequently mentioned by fans who watch NHL games today or read NHL match previews. The fact that he is a strong player in net can not only serve the team well, but also enhance his worth in the news of trade and injury, which can affect his marketability and negotiation of a contract. Consequently, this has seen his financial portfolio bear on-ice and off-ice opportunities.To sum up, the net worth of Linus Ullmark consists of a number of huge NHL contracts, performance bonuses, career performance, and endorsements. Since joining the Boston Bruins and his current position with the Ottawa Senators, he has established a career that has been both superb in the sport as well as financially.Also Read: Brad Marchand’s lifestyle: Inside Florida Panthers star’s early life, NHL career, and personal adventures
Article Summary: Linus ullmark is the current ottawa senators goaltender. His net worth is estimated to be tens of millions, in great part due to his high-value deals and performance bonuses. His last transaction, which was signed at the end of 2024, is a 4-year, $33 million agreement with an average of 8.25 million per season.

Article Title: Why Bryson DeChambeau's LIV golf frustrations spark skepticism among PGA Tour players despite his rising YouTube fame?
Article Text:
Why Bryson DeChambeau's LIV golf frustrations spark skepticism among PGA Tour players despite his rising YouTube fame?

Bryson DeChambeau won’t quit golf for YouTube thinks Michael Kim



Bryson DeChambeau looks for ways to challenge himself



There has been much discussion about Bryson DeChambeau's future, particularly since Brooks Koepka left LIV. The 5x major champion’s contract with LIV ran through 2026, but he left earlier. Notably, with DeChambeau’s contract coming to an end in 2026, many wonder what he will do next. Many anticipate he will take up content creation on a full-time basis. Michael Kim, a pro on the PGA Tour, isn't entirely persuaded.Kim commented under an X post, hinting that the LIV golfer might be a full-time YouTube golfer who only performs in major events.“Idk Bryson well, but he is a golf competitive psycho. YouTube has been great for him, but I have a very hard time believing that just YouTube will fulfill that competitiveness. They both need each other, and I would be shocked if they don’t get a deal done.”There are more than 2.56 million subscribers on Bryson DeChambeau's YouTube channel, with over 244 videos, and his videos have gained more than 500 million views. Each video receives 2 million per video. The LIV golfer's fame as a YouTube sensation has only increased over time.He enjoys a variety of challenges, such as the Break 50, Random Club Challenge, and Shot Cup Challenges, to make his content engaging and enjoyable.However, DeChambeau invites fellow golfers, YouTubers, athletes from other sports, and celebrities. Among the celebrities that have made appearances in his videos are Kevin Hart, Adam Sandler, Donald Trump, Jason Kidd, Phil Mickelson, and John Daly.This gave some fans and observers the impression that he could abandon professional golf in favor of a full-time career in entertainment. Michael Kim, however, disagrees. He feels it's improbable that DeChambeau will quit LIV and concentrate only on YouTube because of how competitive he is.DeChambeau is known for being a fiercely competitive professional golfer. He even took a unique physics-based approach to become one of the biggest drivers in golf. In 2021, the American professional declared that he would keep improving his skills in a "relentless pursuit of excellence.” Therefore, he might not give up on competitive golf that easily. But the conclusion of the contract discussions will also have an impact.“Because I could just do YouTube golf and be totally fine as well,” is what DeChambeau said in an interview with Flushing It Golf.“I mean, look, it’s confidential. I’m not going to share too much, but the conversations are in process. We have to get to a place where both parties have a good understanding of one another. It is getting to a place that makes sense for both sides,” he claimed.Bryson DeChambeau discussed a mental quality that, in his opinion, keeps him concentrated under duress. In a Bryan Bros Golf video uploaded on December 29, 2025, the 2x US Open winner said that he tries to create a competitive atmosphere even when creating YouTube content.DeChambeau said, “That’s why I do YouTube challenges in content creation because it keeps me locked in.” That’s his way of getting comfortable in the most uncomfortable situations.A clean divorce from LIV Golf seems improbable for someone like Bryson DeChambeau, as Michael Kim's analysis highlights. While YouTube continues to grow its influence, the need for real competition may keep it tied to the Saudi-backed league.Also read: Bryson DeChambeau and Lilia Schneider combined net worth: LIV Golf earnings, endorsements, and relationship buzz
Article Summary: Bryson dechambeau's contract with liv golf runs out in 2026. The liv golfer has become a youtube sensation. Many believe he will take up content creation on a full-time basis. Michael kim, a pro on the pga tour, isn't entirely persuaded.

Article Title: ‘Past girlfriends’ as ‘adversaries’? Donna Kelce’s ‘Traitors’ line lit up Travis and Jason Kelce’s dating discourse
Article Text:
One sentence. A lot of noise. Donna Kelce’s ‘past girlfriends’ line on “The Traitors” had the internet reading between every word. (Images via Getty)

Donna Kelce’s ‘past girlfriends’ line landed because it hit Travis Kelce’s public dating history

The Traitors US | Friend or Foe? The Cast Predicts Who They’ll Meet in the Castle

The timing is not subtle with ‘ The Traitors ’ premiere and Taylor Swift in the picture

Donna Kelce did not name names. She did not need to. In a promo video posted Wednesday, Jan. 7, the 73-year-old mother of Jason Kelce and Travis Kelce said she did not want to run into “Maybe some of my sons’ adversaries,” adding, “That could either be on other teams, or it could be coaches, or it could be past girlfriends.” The clip ran ahead of Peacock’s Season 4 premiere of “The Traitors” on Thursday, Jan. 8, at 9 p.m. ET, per Page Six, which also quoted the exchange.Donna Kelce framed it like a mom joke, but the phrasing did the work. She grouped “past girlfriends” with rival teams and coaches, and that is why it stuck. She also described them as “adversaries,” even if she delivered it with a wink.Multiple outlets picked up the moment, including Us Weekly, Parade, and Page Six. All of them pointed to the same core detail: she talked about “past girlfriends” as people she would rather not see inside the “Traitors” castle.The context matters. Jason Kelce has kept most of his dating life private before he married Kylie Kelce in 2018. Travis Kelce has not had that luxury. His relationships became public storylines.Before his engagement to Taylor Swift , Travis dated Kayla Nicole on and off for years before they split in 2022, per Us Weekly and Parade.He also dated Maya Benberry after his 2016 dating show “Chasing Kelce,” per Page Six. Donna Kelce did not point at any one woman. She still handed the internet a headline-ready quote.Donna Kelce has also joked about her sons’ dating lives before. On Jason and Travis’ “New Heights” podcast in May 2025, she said, “Jason, you didn’t really bring a lot of ladies home.” She followed that up with, “You dated but I didn’t know any of them,” and then added, “With Trav, I met one or two. I knew nothing of anybody you guys were dating in college. You told me zero.” Jason leaned into it with his own self-burn, saying, “I had zero game and I looked like an overweight oompa loompa,” before Donna replied, “You’ve changed, so that’s good. ”That track record is why her “Traitors” line reads less like a scandal and more like Donna Kelce staying consistent. She teases. The internet turns it into a referendum.Donna Kelce is stepping into a reality-TV format built for suspicion, alliances, and confessionals. Even a throwaway line becomes a plot hook. That is why her “past girlfriends” mention popped ahead of the Season 4 premiere on Thursday, Jan. 8.She also walked into this moment with her family already sitting under a microscope. Travis Kelce’s relationship with Swift became one of the most covered celebrity sports crossovers since they started dating in 2023. Donna Kelce has publicly supported it. In 2023, she told WSJ.com, “I can tell you this, he’s happier than I’ve seen him in a long time,” and added, “God bless him, he shot for the stars!”So when she casually lumps “past girlfriends” into the “adversaries” category, people read it through that lens. Fans treat it like a message. Even when it is not one.Donna Kelce also made clear she had her own wish list for the castle. She said she hoped to see Martha Stewart, Stevie Nicks, and Shaquille O’Neal, per Us Weekly and Page Six. She did not get that lineup. She did get a cast full of reality-TV and entertainment names, and she is now part of the story instead of just adjacent to it.Bottom line: Donna Kelce did not call out a specific ex. She did not accuse anyone of anything. She delivered one clean sentence that sounded like a mom joke, and it hit harder because Travis Kelce’s dating life has been public for years. That is the whole spark. That is why it traveled.
Article Summary: Donna kelce’s ‘past girlfriends’ line on ‘the traitors’ had the internet reading between every word. The 73-year-old mother of jason kelce and travis kelce said she did not want to run into “maybe some of my sons’ adversaries,” adding, “that could either be on other teams, or it could be coaches, or it could be past girlfriends.” the clip ran ahead of peacock’s season 4 premiere of “the traitor” on thursday, jan. 8, at 9 p.m.

Article Title: Mustafizur Rahman row: Did BCCI offer Bangladesh pacer return to IPL? BCB clarifies
Article Text:
Mustafizur Rahman

Bangladesh seek T20 WC match shift from India after Mustafizur Rahman's IPL exit

Bangladesh pacer Mustafizur Rahman’s release from the Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) squad for the IPL 2026 season has led to a dispute between the cricket boards of India and Bangladesh.Mustafizur, who was bought for Rs 9.20 crore at the auction last month, was released from the squad, a move that upset the Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB). In recent days, reports on social media suggested that the BCCI was considering reversing the decision, but the BCB president has denied those claims.BCB president Aminul Islam Bulbul responded to reports that the BCCI had offered to allow Mustafizur to return to the IPL 2026 amid the ongoing issue between the two boards.After Mustafizur’s exit from the IPL was confirmed, relations between the BCCI and the BCB worsened on several fronts. Bangladesh has stopped the telecast of IPL matches in the country until further notice and has also refused to travel to India for the upcoming T20 World Cup.Some reports claimed that senior BCCI officials were not consulted before the decision to release Mustafizur and that the instruction came from the top level of the board.As speculation grew about a possible change in stance by the BCCI, Bulbul rejected the reports."I have not had any written or verbal discussions (with the BCCI) regarding Mustafizur's (return to the IPL). I have not spoken to anyone from my board about this. There is no truth to this news," Bulbul was quoted as saying by Ajker Patrika.After Mustafizur’s release, the BCB informed the International Cricket Council that it would not play its matches in India during the T20 World Cup 2026, citing security concerns, and asked for the games to be shifted to co-host Sri Lanka.The T20 World Cup is set to begin on February 7. Bangladesh are scheduled to play four matches, three in Kolkata and one in Mumbai. The ICC has not yet indicated any plan to move Bangladesh’s fixtures from Kolkata and Mumbai to Colombo.
Article Summary: Mustafizur rahman was released from the kolkata knight riders squad for the ipl 2026 season. The decision has led to a dispute between the cricket boards of india and bangladesh. Bangladesh has stopped the telecast of ipl matches in the country until further notice and has also refused to travel to india for the upcoming t20 world cup.
